name: Goregrind
description: Death Metal-influenced riffs with rhythms ranging from very fast to slower mid-tempos correlated with pitch-shifted vocals, sloppy playing and production, and gore-themed aesthetics.

children.name: Gorenoise
children.description: Combines and subverts Goregrind and Grindcore with brash Noise and even faster drum tempos.

children.name: Pornogrind
children.description: Groovy, mid-tempo style known for its exaggerated bouncy rhythm and common pornographic themes.
